location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requiring 250 candies of sulphur for the use of the Government of Fort St. George.
